title: Aubergine rolls with a pepper sauce
ingredients: ['4 tablespoons olive oil', '1/2 onion, minced', '2 red peppers, seeded and cubed', '120ml vegetable stock', 'salt and pepper, to taste', '2 aubergines', '150g mozzarella cheese, cut into small cubes', '2 tomatoes, cut into small cubes', 'chopped fresh basil, to taste']
